title: Bell Pepper Salsa
directions: Combine all ingredients into a small bowl. Serve with steak, carnitas, or carne asada.
ingredients: 1 large bell pepper, stem and seeds removed, finely chopped
2 Tbsp chopped arugula, basil, or parsley
2 Tbsp sherry vinegar or apple cider vinegar
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
